Fight for a Better America

We mobilize leaders and the public to fight for stronger and more ethical leadership, effective policy, and a more equitable future for all Americans.

Join the Team

Our Priorities

Invest

To identify and invest in (“seed fund”) early field organizing and other value-add activities in key districts and states for 2018 and 2020.

Initiatives

Our capacity building program supports carefully chosen initiatives aimed at resisting the Trump agenda & flipping key states/districts.
